name: Khutz Ruins
description:
CONTROLS

[E] Interact 

[SPACE BAR] Jump

[LEFT MOUSE CLICK] - Forward Pulse 

[RIGHT MOUSE CLICK] - Upward Pulse ** HOLD for POWERFUL upward pulse. **TAP for QUICK WEAK upward pulse.

*To experience this game as intended, please download our windows build!

TIPS

  • Get the flame and place them where they belong to proceed through the gates!
  • Wait for indicator to appear on your feet to know when to use the powerful upward pulse.
  • In the puzzle section. Get close to the stones and forward pulse to get the to move.
  • On the platform section be sure to rely on quick successions of the upward pulse to get through the gates
